duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct nursing care, health maintenance, teaching, counseling, collaborative planning, and rehabilitation.
Collaborate with physicians and other disciplines to ensure quality, cost-effective patient care.
Effectively delegate appropriate patient care activities to co-workers with the required knowledge and skill level.
Perform patient teaching and provide care to patients in accordance with the plan of care and practice standards.
Provide care in a non-judgmental manner that respects patients' rights, autonomy, dignity, and confidentiality.
